q_and_a.question: 1. Is the bed to the left of the desk?
q_and_a.answer: No. The bed sits to the right of the desk.

q_and_a.question: 2. Is the lamp in front of the desk?
q_and_a.answer: No. The lamp is sitting on top of the desk, not out in front of it.
